message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
I really like the product, but $10,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $9,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
